projects.name: BookWebStore
projects.description: An immersive ASP.NET-based bookstore ecommerce website offering a user-friendly platform to explore, purchase, and discover a vast collection of books, seamlessly blending modern design with efficient functionality for a delightful online shopping experience.

projects.name: MovieHub
projects.description: A dynamic movie streaming website, crafted with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, providing an engaging interface for users to seamlessly browse, stream, and enjoy a diverse range of films with responsive design and intuitive navigation.

projects.name: MusicStreamingSite
projects.description: An interactive music streaming platform, elegantly designed with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, delivering a seamless audio experience by enabling users to explore, play, and discover a vast catalog of tunes with user-friendly controls and modern aesthetics
